snippet: A former administration lawyer says secrecy makes the program seem illegal.
abstract: Editorial urges Pres Obama to consider many of recommendations made by Harold Koh, former legal adviser to State Department, if he is serious about his pledge to create greater transparency in using drones for targeted killing of terrorists overseas.
lead_paragraph: A former administration lawyer says secrecy makes the program seem illegal.
